Formula 1 was back in action this weekend with the season-opening Austrian Grand Prix and the drivers laid on an absolutely spectacular return to racing for us at the Red Bull Ring.

articles.title: Ramos controversial penalty helps Real Madrid maintain four point La Liga lead - The World Game
articles.description: Sergio Ramos was Real Madrid's penalty hero for the second time in four days as a 1-0 win at Athletic Bilbao sent the LaLiga leaders seven points clear.
